narrative:
A focused inspection was conducted with the Attending Veterinarian to follow up on noncompliances identified
during the previous inspection on 9/10/2014.  Mats have been added to kennels where the dogs could have their
feet pass into the gaps of the slatted flooring.  Two animals (dog named Hudson, ID# 982000362183995 and kitten
named Pebbles, ID#83-4-395) were observed to be in good condition and medical records clearly outlined their
conditions, treatment, and plan for follow-up where needed.  
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
